title: Wonderful Everyday Down the Rabbit-Hole
notes: Tested with the official patch. Works great. Font looks fine, doesn't have the unreadable kerning issues I got last time I tried the game in Wine. Graphical glitch when taking screenshots through Steam, which fixed on restarting the game. Recommend disabling the overlay.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.7-200.fc28.x86_64, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: It works fine, but kerning issues (https://i.imgur.com/6woPxCg.png - no spoilers) are preventing me from playing via Steam Play. On the other hand, Steam via wine does not have this issue, so exactly the opposite to the report of other user.
title: Wonderful Everyday Down the Rabbit-Hole
